# Dindin - Wireframes Conceituais: Novas Features

> Documento de UX para as features dos Epics 2, 3 e 5 do PRD
> Criado por: Uma (UX Design Expert)
> Data: 2026-02-20
> Baseado nos padr\u00f5es visuais existentes do Dindin (Apple Design Language, --primary: #5100FF)

---

## Design Principles Aplicados

Todos os wireframes seguem os padr\u00f5es j\u00e1 estabelecidos no Dindin:

| Padr\u00e3o | Valor | Uso |
|---------|-------|-----|
| Border-radius cards | 20px (`--radius-lg`) | Todos os cards |
| Border-radius inputs | 12px (`--radius-md`) | Inputs, bot\u00f5es |
| Padding cards | 16-24px | Depend do contexto |
| Cor prim\u00e1ria | #5100FF (Purple) | CTAs, FAB, destaques |
| Cor sucesso | #34C759 (Green) | Positivo, saud\u00e1vel |
| Cor alerta | #FF9500 (Orange) | Aten\u00e7\u00e3o, quase no limite |
| Cor perigo | #FF3B30 (Red) | Negativo, ultrapassado |
| Fonte | -apple-system (San Francisco) | Global |
| Sombra cards | 0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.04) | `--shadow-sm` |
| Anima\u00e7\u00f5es | 0.2s ease / cubic-bezier | Transi\u00e7\u00f5es |

---

```
\u2502                          \u2502 + \u2502   \u2502
\u2502                          \u2514\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2518   \u2502
\u2502                          [FAB]    \u2502
\u2514\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2518
```

**Notas de intera\u00e7\u00e3o:**
- Header reutiliza o padr\u00e3o de navega\u00e7\u00e3o por m\u00eas (`< fev >`) j\u00e1 usado em Transa\u00e7\u00f5es
- Card de resumo no topo agrega todos os or\u00e7amentos do m\u00eas
- Cada card de or\u00e7amento \u00e9 expans\u00edvel (tap) para revelar a\u00e7\u00f5es de editar/excluir (padr\u00e3o Bills)
- FAB (+) para adicionar novo or\u00e7amento (padr\u00e3o j\u00e1 existente)
- Swipe left para excluir, swipe right para editar (padr\u00e3o Transa\u00e7\u00f5es)
- Barra de progresso: 6px height, border-radius full, cores sem\u00e2nticas

### 1.2 Cores da Barra de Progresso

```
  0%                    75%        90%       100%
  |------- GREEN --------|-- ORANGE --|-- RED --|
  #34C759                 #FF9500      #FF3B30

  Saud\u00e1vel (0-75%):     \u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591\u2591  GREEN
  Aten\u00e7\u00e3o (75-90%):     \u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2591  ORANGE
  Cr\u00edtico (90-100%):   \u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591  RED
  Ultrapassado (>100%): \u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588  RED + pulso sutil
```

### 1.3 Modal: Adicionar Or\u00e7amento (Bottom Sheet)

```
\u250c\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2510
\u2502                                   \u2502
\u2502  \u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500  (drag handle, 40px)       \u2502
\u2502                                   \u2502
\u2502  Novo Or\u00e7amento              [X]  \u2502
\u2502                                   \u2502
\u2502  Categoria                        \u2502
\u2502  \u250c\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2510  \u2502
\u2502  \u2502 \ud83c\udf54 Alimenta\u00e7\u00e3o           \u25bc  \u2502  \u2502
\u2502  \u2514\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2518  \u2502
\u2502  (s\u00f3 mostra categorias sem       \u2502
\u2502   or\u00e7amento neste m\u00eas)            \u2502
\u2502                                   \u2502
\u2502  Limite mensal                     \u2502
\u2502  \u250c\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2510  \u2502
\u2502  \u2502 R$  1.000,00                \u2502  \u2502
\u2502  \u2514\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2518  \u2502
\u2502  (teclado num\u00e9rico, input          \u2502
\u2502   com m\u00e1scara monet\u00e1ria)           \u2502
\u2502                                   \u2502
\u2502  \u250c\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2510  \u2502
\u2502  \u2502      Criar Or\u00e7amento         \u2502  \u2502
\u2502  \u2502      [PRIMARY BUTTON]        \u2502  \u2502
\u2502  \u2514\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2518  \u2502
\u2502                                   \u2502
\u2514\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2518
```

**Notas de intera\u00e7\u00e3o:**
- Bottom sheet com drag handle (padr\u00e3o mobile nativo)
- Anima\u00e7\u00e3o `slideUp 0.3s ease-out` (padr\u00e3o existente)
- Backdrop `rgba(0,0,0,0.8)` com backdrop-filter blur
- Select de categoria filtra automaticamente as que j\u00e1 t\u00eam or\u00e7amento
- Input monet\u00e1rio com m\u00e1scara (R$ X.XXX,XX)
- Teclado num\u00e9rico via `inputMode="decimal"`
- Haptic feedback no bot\u00e3o "Criar"

### 1.4 Card Expandido (Tap no Or\u00e7amento)

```
  \u250c\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2510
  \u2502 \ud83c\udf54 Alimenta\u00e7\u00e3o              \u2502
  \u2502 R$ 890 de R$ 1.000    89%  \u2502
  \u2502 \u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2588\u2591\u2591\u2591  \u2502
  \u2502          [ORANGE]            \u2502
  \u251c\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2524
  \u2502 Restam R$ 110,00           \u2502
  \u2502 17 transa\u00e7\u00f5es neste m\u00eas     \u2502
  \u2502                             \u2502
  \u2502  [\u270f Editar]   [\ud83d\uddd1 Excluir]  \u2502
  \u2502  [blue tint]  [red tint]    \u2502
  \u2514\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2518
```

**Notas:**
- Expans\u00e3o com anima\u00e7\u00e3o 0.2s cubic-bezier (padr\u00e3o Bills)
- Separador 1px `var(--border)` entre conte\u00fado e a\u00e7\u00f5es
- Bot\u00f5es seguem padr\u00e3o existente: tint background + cor do texto

**Notas de intera\u00e7\u00e3o:**
- Widget posicionado na sidebar direita do Dashboard (abaixo de Cart\u00f5es e Contas)
- Ordena\u00e7\u00e3o: maior % utilizado primeiro (urgentes no topo)
- M\u00e1ximo 3 itens no widget (os mais cr\u00edticos)
- "Ver todos" navega para `/budgets`
- Card style: `var(--bg-card)`, `var(--shadow-sm)`, border-radius 20px

---

- \u00cdcone de exporta\u00e7\u00e3o (\ud83d\udce4) no header abre action sheet com op\u00e7\u00f5es CSV/PDF
- Chips de per\u00edodo r\u00e1pido: "Este m\u00eas" (ativo por padr\u00e3o), "\u00dalt. 3 meses", "Customizado"
- Chip ativo: `var(--primary)` background, white text
- Chip inativo: `var(--bg-secondary)` background
- Cards de resumo reutilizam padr\u00e3o do Dashboard (3-columns, border colorido)
- Gr\u00e1ficos reutilizam `CategoryPieChart` e `CumulativeLineChart` existentes
- Lista por categoria \u00e9 expans\u00edvel (tap revela transa\u00e7\u00f5es individuais)
- Scroll suave entre se\u00e7\u00f5es

**Notas de intera\u00e7\u00e3o:**
- Desktop: filtros inline em uma \u00fanica linha com bot\u00f5es de exporta\u00e7\u00e3o \u00e0 direita
- Gr\u00e1ficos lado a lado (50/50) em desktop, stacked em mobile
- Cada linha de categoria \u00e9 expans\u00edvel: ao expandir, mostra as transa\u00e7\u00f5es individuais
- Bot\u00f5es de export com \u00edcones: download arrow (\u21e3)

---

**Notas de intera\u00e7\u00e3o:**

- Exemplo de dado real abaixo de cada select (extra\u00eddo da primeira linha do CSV)
- Preview mostra as 5 primeiras linhas j\u00e1 mapeadas para valida\u00e7\u00e3o visual
- Scroll dentro do card de preview se necess\u00e1rio
- Select dropdown com op\u00e7\u00f5es: Data, Descri\u00e7\u00e3o, Valor, Categoria, Ignorar
- "Ignorar" para colunas que n\u00e3o se aplicam

## 5. VALIDA\u00c7\u00c3O DOS PARADIGMAS DE INTERA\u00c7\u00c3O

### 5.1 Barras de Progresso de Or\u00e7amento

| Aspecto | Avalia\u00e7\u00e3o | Notas |
|---------|-----------|-------|
| Consist\u00eancia | \u2705 Aprovado | Reutiliza o padr\u00e3o de 6px height de Goals e Bills |
| Cores sem\u00e2nticas | \u2705 Aprovado | Green/Orange/Red alinhado com padr\u00f5es existentes |
| Feedback visual | \u2705 Aprovado | Percentual num\u00e9rico + barra = dupla confirma\u00e7\u00e3o |
| Estado ultrapassado | \u2705 Aprovado | Barra 100% vermelha + mensagem textual + pulse sutil |
| Acessibilidade | \u26a0 Aten\u00e7\u00e3o | Incluir `aria-valuenow`, `aria-valuemax` e texto sr-only |

**Recomenda\u00e7\u00e3o:** Adicionar anima\u00e7\u00e3o de "preenchimento" quando a barra aparece (transition width 0.5s ease). J\u00e1 existe este padr\u00e3o em Bills.

### 5.2 Filtros de Relat\u00f3rio

| Aspecto | Avalia\u00e7\u00e3o | Notas |
|---------|-----------|-------|
| Chips de per\u00edodo | \u2705 Aprovado | Padr\u00e3o familiar, reduz carga cognitiva |
| Persistir filtros | \u2705 Aprovado | Evita frustra\u00e7\u00e3o de "resetar tudo" ao navegar |
| Desktop inline | \u2705 Aprovado | Filtros + export na mesma linha = eficiente |
| Mobile stacked | \u2705 Aprovado | Segue padr\u00e3o mobile de Transa\u00e7\u00f5es |
| Per\u00edodo customizado | \u26a0 Aten\u00e7\u00e3o | Usar date picker nativo do mobile, n\u00e3o calendar modal |

**Recomenda\u00e7\u00e3o:** No mobile, esconder filtros atr\u00e1s de bot\u00e3o toggle (padr\u00e3o j\u00e1 usado em Transa\u00e7\u00f5es). Chips de per\u00edodo sempre vis\u00edveis, filtros secund\u00e1rios (tipo, categorias) colaps\u00e1veis.

### 5.3 Mapeamento de Colunas CSV

| Aspecto | Avalia\u00e7\u00e3o | Notas |
|---------|-----------|-------|
| Auto-detec\u00e7\u00e3o | \u2705 Aprovado | Reduz trabalho manual, usu\u00e1rio s\u00f3 confirma |
| Preview de dados | \u2705 Aprovado | 5 linhas = valida\u00e7\u00e3o visual suficiente |
| Exemplo por campo | \u2705 Aprovado | Mostra dado real abaixo do select = clareza |
| Op\u00e7\u00e3o "Ignorar" | \u2705 Aprovado | Essencial para colunas desnecess\u00e1rias |
| Scroll horizontal | \u26a0 Aten\u00e7\u00e3o | Em mobile, evitar tabela horizontal. Usar lista vertical |

**Recomenda\u00e7\u00e3o:** Mapeamento vertical (um campo por vez) \u00e9 melhor para mobile do que tabela horizontal. Cada coluna do CSV aparece como um card com select + exemplo de dado.

### 5.4 FileUploader Multiplataforma

| Aspecto | Avalia\u00e7\u00e3o | Notas |
|---------|-----------|-------|
| Drag & drop (desktop) | \u2705 Aprovado | Padr\u00e3o esperado em desktop |
| Tap to select (mobile) | \u2705 Aprovado | Abre seletor nativo do OS |
| Borda tracejada | \u2705 Aprovado | Padr\u00e3o universalmente reconhecido como "drop zone" |
| Estado de arrasto | \u2705 Aprovado | Borda primary + tint = feedback claro |
| Preview do arquivo | \u2705 Aprovado | Nome + tamanho + bot\u00e3o remover |
| Haptic feedback | \u2705 Aprovado | Consist\u00eancia com o resto do app |

**Recomenda\u00e7\u00e3o:** Adicionar estado de loading (spinner + barra de progresso) durante o parsing do PDF, especialmente para arquivos grandes. J\u00e1 existe padr\u00e3o de loading no app.

---

## 6. RESPONSIVIDADE: MOBILE vs DESKTOP

### Or\u00e7amentos

| Elemento | Mobile | Desktop |
|----------|--------|---------|
| Layout | Single column, scroll vertical | Two-column: lista + resumo lateral |
| Card de resumo | Topo, full-width | Sidebar direita (sticky) |
| Adicionar | FAB (bot\u00e3o flutuante) | Bot\u00e3o inline no header |
| A\u00e7\u00f5es | Swipe + expand | Hover + expand |
| Navega\u00e7\u00e3o mensal | Header centralizado | Header com setas |

### Relat\u00f3rios

| Elemento | Mobile | Desktop |
|----------|--------|---------|
| Filtros | Chips vis\u00edveis + toggle para extras | Inline uma linha |
| Gr\u00e1ficos | Stacked (pizza em cima, linha embaixo) | Side by side (50/50) |
| Exporta\u00e7\u00e3o | Action sheet (bottom) | Bot\u00f5es inline no header |
| Detalhamento | Accordion por categoria | Tabela expans\u00edvel |

### Importa\u00e7\u00e3o

| Elemento | Mobile | Desktop |
|----------|--------|---------|
| Upload zone | Tap to select | Drag & drop + click |
| Preview PDF | Lista vertical scroll | Tabela com colunas |
| Mapeamento CSV | Cards verticais (1 por vez) | Grid 2 colunas |
| Resultado | Tela full | Modal |

---

## 7. MICRO-INTERA\u00c7\u00d5ES E ANIMA\u00c7\u00d5ES

| Intera\u00e7\u00e3o | Anima\u00e7\u00e3o | Padr\u00e3o Existente |
|-----------|----------|-----------------|
| Card de or\u00e7amento aparece | fadeIn 0.3s (opacity + translateY) | `.animate-fade-in` |
| Barra de progresso preenche | width transition 0.5s ease | Bills progress bar |
| Or\u00e7amento ultrapassado | Pulse sutil (scale 1.0 \u2192 1.02) | Novo, mas sutil |
| Bottom sheet abre | slideUp 0.3s ease-out | ImportInvoiceModal |
| Chip de filtro ativa | background-color 0.2s ease | Nav active state |
| Gr\u00e1fico atualiza | Smooth data transition | Componentes existentes |
| Checkbox marca/desmarca | scale 0.95 \u2192 1.0 + haptic | Bills checkbox |
| Arquivo arrastado sobre zona | border-color + bg transition 0.2s | Import modal drag |
| Toast de sucesso (p\u00f3s-import) | slideDown 0.3s + fadeOut ap\u00f3s 3s | Novo, padr\u00e3o comum |

---

**Notas:**
- Or\u00e7amentos e Relat\u00f3rios ficam ap\u00f3s Perfis, antes do separador de Minha Conta

- Importa\u00e7\u00e3o n\u00e3o tem nav item pr\u00f3prio \u2014 acessada via Transa\u00e7\u00f5es ou Fatura do Cart\u00e3o
- \u00cdcones: Target (\ud83c\udfaf) para or\u00e7amentos (meta por categoria), BarChart (\ud83d\udcca) para relat\u00f3rios
